item.title: Mermaid Test Page
item.description: Mermaid Test Page This is a simple test page to verify that Mermaid diagrams are working correctly with our Hugo theme. Simple Flowchart graph TD A[Start] --> B{Is it working?} B -->|Yes| C[Great!] B -->|No| D[Need to fix it] C --> E[End] D --> E Simple Sequence Diagram sequenceDiagram participant A as User participant B as System A->>B: Request B->>A: Response
